---

Resource: [User Story Examples](https://github.com/seanrioux/user-story-examples)

Who is the user?

- A student
- A professor

What do they want to do?

- Login to the website
- Upload a word document

What does this accomplish?
- Grants access to the application
- Helps provide context to the AI

What are the acceptance criteria?
- Given some condition
- When this happens
- Then this will occur

User story can be moved to done once all linked issues are closed.
